3: You all found some new friends while Nanami went for a walk!
...This voice.
Who's there?!
Yoohoo, we meet again!
Who's this girl?
Your weapon looks so explosive! Nanami's interested and wants to take a gander at it!
You came out unscathed from the middle of that explosion!
Nanami's very scathed thank you very much. See, my dress is torn and it took me so long to fix it.
How did you...
...This is the Construct you encountered within the factory?
Ooph—so very chilly, I can feel the magnetic fields of a woman in her winters. Nanami's about to be all frozen up.
She's, just as weird as the rumors say.
The one who blew up the factory? You have too much time.
Oh, it's not that big of a deal, ehehe—
...It's not a compliment!
Anyway, Nanami, why are you here?
I dunno—After the factory went all boom boom, Nanami just wandered around and just happened to be here.
And then and then, you all looked like you need the help of a genius!
So what do you say? Lemme help lemme help! You know Nanami's cut for the job!
Nanami, doing it with style!
